description: Erection of 'Piggyback' roof extension with installation of 4no. rooflights and rear gable window to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

Before the beneficial occupation of the development hereby permitted, any new rooflights in the east and west roof pitches shall be fitted with, and retained in, obscure glazing to a minimum of level 3 on the standard scale. Any film used to achieve the requisite obscurity level shall be non-perishable and tamper-proof, and shall be replaced immediately in the event that it ceases to result in obscurity to level 3. Reason: To protect the amenities and privacy of the occupiers of the adjoining residential properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Conditions 4 (Construction Logistics Report), 5 (Acoustic Report), 6 (Sustainable Drainage Strategy) of planning permission 20/01210/FUL are hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
